elytracontrol.title: Elytra Control Config
options.elytracontrol.elytraCancel.descr: Whether allowed to stop flying in mid air or not
options.elytracontrol.elytraLock.descrip: Enable or Disable elytra lock feature
options.elytracontrol.wingFlapSpeed.desc: Adjust the rate at which the Elytra's wings flap.
options.elytracontrol.minVelocity.descri: Set the minimal velocity to start and stop elytra from flapping.
options.elytracontrol.maxVelocity.descri: Set the maximal velocity to stop and start elytra from flapping.
options.elytracontrol.flapAmplitude.desc: Control the extent of the Elytra's wing flapping motion, influencing lift, drag, and overall aerodynamic characteristics.
options.elytracontrol.subtleFlapFactor.d: Fine-tune the Elytra's wing flapping pattern, adjusting the subtle nuances of its motion to optimize stability, responsiveness, and overall flight feel.
options.elytracontrol.easyFlight.descrip: Make elytra to start flying easier, with just right click while holding fireworks (right hand/left hand)
